name: somerset
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a county (= an area with its own local government) in southwestern England: She grew up on her parents' apple cider farm in Somerset.
More examplesFewer examplesLocke was born in Wrington, Somerset.He lives near Frome, in Somerset.Somerset is more than just pretty scenery.the Somerset market town of Glastonbury
